name: Cargills Kalu Heeneti Rice
description: Kalu Heeneti is literally translated as "dark, fine grain". It is a highly nutritious red rice that is considered to be good for daily consumption. Kalu Heeneti red rice used in traditional medicine is also rich in iron, zinc and fibre. It is also considered an ideal nutritional option for children, mothers and babies over 6 months of age.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
